Nihal Singh

Coding enthusiast

About

Hi! I am Nihal Singh. I am a third year undergraduate student at the Civil Engineering department in IIT-Bombay.

I love gaming. From FPSs to RPGs, I play all sort of games. I am a huge fan of the Call Of Duty and Assassins Creed series. I love football. Even though it’s been a while since I stopped following the premier league, I play whenever I get the chance. I listen to Metal and Rock music.

Coding is my favourite hobby, and a majority of my time is spent indulging in it. I have enjoyed programming ever since I knew what it meant. I continue to learn and develop new things everyday. I have fun contributing to open source as well.

Over the period of my stay at IIT, I have learnt a lot. I have successfully 'completed' and contributed to a few projects.

I am currently a manager of The Web and Coding Club - IIT Bombay.
